metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0547 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OpenVPN 2.1 until v2.4.12 and v2.5.6 may enable authentication bypass in external authentication plug-ins when more than one of them makes use of deferred authentication replies, which allows an external user to be granted access with only partially correct credentials.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0547` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.5.5-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.5-1ubuntu3').
